丸山桂里奈早前於一個綜藝節目接受訪問時表示，認為日本隊可在小組3戰全勝。被問到願意拿什麼來打賭，丸山竟表示：「如猜錯的話，就露屁股給大家看。」結果，日本雖於分組出線，但成績僅為1勝1和1負。丸山日前於另一綜藝節目上自然被問到有關找數的問題，這位前日本女足成員就揚言會兌現諾言：「我會遵守諾言的，但請給我一些時間作準備。」

同利迷談到兩星期未簽人...佢地叫我有d耐性..

轉會窗的第3周
轉會無進展...不停 F5 Twitter...都無用..

轉會窗的第4周
曾嘗試出魔咒希望利記簽到人..不過無作用..其他球隊同事笑說道 : ha.. 又話下年奪冠嘅 !~

轉會窗的第5周
起身見到終於簽了人...原來係幼幼...只會踢青年軍賽事...

轉會窗的第6周
繼續無進展,只得數單流料...James Pearce 也開始吹淡了...

轉會窗的第7周
James Pearce 出文說 利物浦現有陣容已很完整..陣中球員比轉會目標更好.....叫利迷多d信心吧! 那天我上 Twitter 質問他後..比他串我是 net spend boys...

轉會窗的第8周
轉會新聞很少了..媒體都報導利記唔似會簽到人..不停 F5 Twitter...都無料到..

轉會窗的第10周
所有媒體都唔報導利記簽人了...我知下季又要原陣出征..當時我眼淚不停流出來了.....

John Henry 接受訪問講..球隊好有野心...不明白點解球員會想走.....當天下午看見利物浦官宣賣走當家球星...我看了眼淚不停流出來了..

James Pearce 出文說 利物浦現有陣容已很完整..陣中球員比轉會目標更好.....叫利迷多d信心吧! 那天我上 Twitter 質問他後..比他串我是 net spend boys...

轉會窗的第8周
轉會新聞很少了..媒體都報導利記唔似會簽到人..不停 F5 Twitter...都無料到..

轉會窗的第9周
利迷多了很多籍口來幫 FSG 辯護..佢地對我講..隊波而家嘅嘢都係 FSG 比..要比時間老闆..比時間高普...比時間球員 lor...我諗你唔適合做利迷..

轉會窗的第10周
所有媒體都唔報導利記簽人了...我知下季又要原陣出征..當時我眼淚不停流出來了.....

轉會窗的第11周
John Henry 接受訪問講..球隊好有野心...不明白點解球員會想走.....當天下午看見利物浦官宣賣走當家球星...我看了眼淚不停流出來了..

屙唔出屎的第12周
簽到人了! 簽到人了!!!!!還是七千五百萬鎊巨星...我開心得流下眼淚!!不過下季先正式加盟....一切都太遲了...

Liverpool FC Facebook:
24分鐘 ·

Jürgen Klopp has spoken for the first time about the concussion Loris Karius sustained in the #UCLfinal...
https://www.liverpoolfc.com/news/first-team/306090-jurgen-klopp-loris-karius-concussionhttps://www.liverpoolfc.com/news/first-team/306090-jurgen-klopp-loris-karius-concussion

Jürgen Klopp has spoken for the first time about the concussion Loris Karius sustained in the Champions League final defeat by Real Madrid in May.

The goalkeeper returned to Melwood on Monday to begin pre-season training with Liverpool and is likely to figure in Saturday’s friendly encounter with Chester FC.

Asked whether he feels he has to do anything differently in terms of managing Karius ahead of 2018-19, Klopp told Liverpoolfc.com: “It’s all normal here. I don’t know exactly what people think or made of the situation. The only thing I can say is he had a concussion in the game.

“Whoever had a concussion knows there is not one way how it feels, there are different ways. He didn’t feel it obviously. He had a knock on his head and he felt that but he didn’t know he had a concussion. That’s how concussions are. The guy who has it is the last one to be aware of it probably.

“With all the intensity of the game, adrenaline and the disappointment after the game, nobody really thought about that. I needed a few days, to be honest, to accept the fact and deal with the situation [of losing the final]. It was not that easy.

“After four days I got a call from Franz Beckenbauer, our Bobby Moore, our biggest football player who is a good friend of mine. He called me and said he came from a doctor, he told me: ‘your goalkeeper had a concussion.’ I said, ‘what?’ because in the game, from my position that situation is not very good to see: ‘maybe there was contact or not.’ I told him immediately, ‘OK’. He said the doctor is the most famous doctor in Germany. I said: ‘OK, give me a few minutes, I have to fix a few things.’

“I got all the pictures from different perspectives, saw it and thought: ‘how can we all think that the boy who didn’t show any weakness in that game until then made these big mistakes in a very important game and nobody thinks it’s because of the knock he got?’ How can we think that? That was, for me, the explanation and I thought: ‘OK, come on, we need to check that.’

“I thought it was too late, you cannot check that. But now I know a concussion isn’t coming and going in a day – if you have one, you see it days later. Five days after the final, Loris had 26 of 30 markers for a concussion still. That’s clear.

“If you ask Loris, he says he didn’t think about it and didn’t use it for a second as an excuse. We don’t use it as an excuse, we use it as an explanation. That’s always important, that’s what analysis should be: you explain why things happen. So, from this point of view, from my side everything is fine. We don’t think about that anymore and we start completely new.”

Now back at Melwood and preparing for the season ahead, Klopp insists the Champions League final must be put behind Karius, with a ‘business as usual’ approach adopted by all parties.

The boss said: “That’s how it is. You make a mistake against Chester and it’s a mistake. If you make a mistake in a Champions League final, it’s a mistake you cannot change anymore, even if you want to – and we all want to.

“He was influenced by that knock, that is 100 per cent. What the rest of the world is making of it, I don’t care. It’s really not important what the people say. We do not use it as an excuse.

“Now people could think for us it is the explanation – and for me it is 100 per cent the explanation and that’s all.”

去年夏天，迪比利以1.05億歐元的身價從多蒙特轉會巴塞隆拿，成為了身價歷史第四高的球員，但是他促成自己轉會的方式卻為他招致了極大的爭議，他以罷訓和失聯等略顯極端的方式迫使多蒙特同意其轉會，這讓包括法國主教練迪甘斯在內的很多人都產生了不滿。　　

　　今天，迪甘斯在接受《圖片報》採訪時就大大批評了迪比利的做法：「那是令人無法接受的行為，迪比利這樣的態度導致多蒙特出現了很大的問題，尤其是為他在多蒙特和在國家隊的隊友增添了很多麻煩。」

　　當時由於迪比利的罷訓，迪甘斯在很長一段時間內都沒有將其召喚進入國家隊當中，他說道：「我那時不能將他選入國家隊，因為他根本就沒有訓練，我不能容忍我的球隊陣容中的球員有這樣的態度。」

　　此前，《每日郵報》還曾報導迪比利在世界盃期間沉迷足球經理遊戲，他此前只在對陣澳州的世界盃小組賽中有過一次正選出場的經歷，但效果不佳，此後他的正選位置就被基奧特替代。

去年夏天，迪比利以1.05億歐元的身價從多蒙特轉會巴塞隆拿，成為了身價歷史第四高的球員，但是他促成自己轉會的方式卻為他招致了極大的爭議，他以罷訓和失聯等略顯極端的方式迫使多蒙特同意其轉會，這讓包括法國主教練迪甘斯在內的很多人都產生了不滿。　　

　　今天，迪甘斯在接受《圖片報》採訪時就大大批評了迪比利的做法：「那是令人無法接受的行為，迪比利這樣的態度導致多蒙特出現了很大的問題，尤其是為他在多蒙特和在國家隊的隊友增添了很多麻煩。」

　　當時由於迪比利的罷訓，迪甘斯在很長一段時間內都沒有將其召喚進入國家隊當中，他說道：「我那時不能將他選入國家隊，因為他根本就沒有訓練，我不能容忍我的球隊陣容中的球員有這樣的態度。」

　　此前，《每日郵報》還曾報導迪比利在世界盃期間沉迷足球經理遊戲，他此前只在對陣澳州的世界盃小組賽中有過一次正選出場的經歷，但效果不佳，此後他的正選位置就被基奧特替代。

Trent Alexander-Arnold admits he can’t quite believe how quickly he’s gone from a boy playing grassroots football to the World Cup Finals.

Via @FA

thefa.com/news/2018/jul/…

Trent: “I’m from West Derby in Liverpool, and I don’t know anybody else from my area that has played at a World Cup. I played for Country Park in the Walton and Kirkdale League.”

Trent: “I always used to pretend to be Stevie Gerrard when I was playing as a kid as he is a Scouser. Everyone looked up to him – I don’t think there is any footballer that doesn’t recognise his talent and what he has done for his club and country at World Cups.”

Trent: “The first World Cup I can remember is in 2006 when Italy won it. It just doesn’t happen to lads like me.”

廢中燈死班人

泰國當局及各國救援隊伍，正爭分奪秒營救被困北部清萊府洞穴的12名青少年足球隊員及其教練。英超球會利物浦教練高普接受CNN訪問時，特地拍片為一眾受困者打氣，並引用著名口號「你們永遠不會獨行」（You’ll never walk alone），呼籲他們不要放棄。

高普指：「所有利物浦大家庭的成員都會從心底裏支持你們，我們每一秒都希望你們可以重見天日，所以你們要堅強下去，你們永遠不會獨行！」

13名隊員至今已被困洞穴13日，當局現繼續泵走洞內積水，希望被困隊員毋須潛水離開，但預計大雨將至，救援行動需與時間競賽。另外，醫護人員指他們的身體狀況虛弱，未知何時適合離開。
